explanation: [0-0] A hand is placed on a metal farming tool, which is placed on a gray concrete floor. The metal farm tool consists of three triangular metal pieces and a metal frame.

[0-4] Subsequently, yellow subtitles "simple multifunctional hoe", a yellow thumbs-up emoji, and a laughing-crying emoji appear at the bottom of the screen. One hand unscrews a screw at the back of the farming tool and removes the triangular metal piece from the metal frame. Then, one hand assembles a rectangular metal piece onto the metal frame and tightens the screw.
